description:
This course is designed for consultants, coaches, mentors, educators and accountants who want to use StratPad Cloud with their clients. It provides an in-depth review of StratPad Cloud and its material. The course is comprised of a series of short videos, most of which are followed by a quiz. There is also a 10-question final quiz.

The course helps strategy and business planning professionals increase their service offerings by creating high quality strategic plans and business plans with full financial projections. By taking this course:

  • You will offer your clients additional high-value services.
  • You will markedly differentiate yourself and your firm from competitors.
  • You will gain two unique marketing approaches that will generate new business for you and your firm.
  • You will learn how to generate additional annual revenues in the thousands or tens of thousands of $.
  • Our tools and workshops naturally support your highest-value services and promote on-going client engagements.
  • Youâ€™ll be recognized by StratPad as a partner with whom to pursue other initiatives.

Successfully completing this course is a requirement of Level 1 of the Certified StratPad Coach program.
title: Certified StratPad Coach - Level 1: Business Plan Expert
